thread.section_title: Keepkey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keepkey | keepkey.com | 3 of 9
thread.title: Luis de la Fuente
thread.title_full: Keepkey reviewed by Luis de la Fuente

author: Luis de la Fuente
title: Luis de la Fuente
text:
After I read that the ONLY way to keep your cryptocurrencies safe was "cold storage" offline I looked into the available hardware wallets.
I loved KeepKey's simple looks and large OLED sreen. Setup was a breeze after installing the Chrome app on my PC. I have already purchased 2 additional units to keep all my accounts physically separate.
Great product.
